name: Whisper Party
description:
WARNING : currently the eraser create error, do not use it !!
It's a little online party game based on a mix between chinese whispers and Pictionnary.

You can play with your friend everywhere (From 3 to 12 Players)

The game browser support PC and can support some mobiles.

How to Play :

  • Write an expression and click "validate"
  • When everyone click on validate, you see expression next to you
  • Draw an image based on the expression you receive and click "validate"
  • Loop until you come back to your expression
  • See the funny drawings !
